author: Source: Foster's Daily Democrat
title: Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale Agree on Final Terms of Divorce - Foster's Daily Democrat
text:
Gwen Stefani and Gavin Rossdale did not have a prenuptial agreement and have agreed on the final terms of their divorce, TMZ reports. Because they did not have a prenup, Rossdale is entitled to 50 percent of their joint assets, but agreed to take "far less" than that in order to reach a speedy settlement.
 Foster's Daily Democrat.
